"Smart Kitchen Scale": A kitchen scale that connects to your smartphone and provides personalized recipe recommendations based on the ingredients you have at home. It also tracks your weight and provides nutritional information for each dish you prepare.

"Food Chopper with built-in Sous Vide": A kitchen gadget that combines the functionality of a food chopper with the precision of a sous vide. It allows you to chop and cook your food at the same time, making meal prep quick and easy.

"Egg Cooker with Built-in Avocado Slicer": A kitchen gadget that makes perfect eggs and avocado toast every time. It has multiple settings for different types of eggs (poached, scrambled, or boiled) and a built-in avocado slicer for the perfect slices every time.
"Multi-Functional Kitchen Shears": A kitchen shear that can do more than just cut herbs and meat. It has multiple blades for different tasks, including cheese cutting, pizza cutting, and even sushi.

"Food Thermometer with Built-in Meat Tenderizer": A kitchen gadget that helps you cook your meat to perfection. It has a built-in thermometer to ensure your meat is cooked to the right temperature and a meat tenderizer to make tough cuts of meat tender and juicy.
